snippet: JPMorgan Chase is nearing settlements over its ties to Bernard L. Madoff. | Hilton Worldwide is set to have its stock market debut. | A skeptical view of the Treasury secretary’s reassurances on “too big to fail.” | Facebook is joining the...
abstract: JPMorgan Chase is nearing settlements over its ties to Bernard L. Madoff. | Hilton Worldwide is set to have its stock market debut. | A skeptical view of the Treasury secretary’s reassurances on “too big to fail.” | Facebook is joining the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index.

headline.main: JPMorgan Nears Settlement in Madoff Case
